function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Cultural insensitivity in health response and decision-making","Impact":"Inadequate response to the needs of culturally diverse communities, leading to mistrust, non-compliance, and higher infection rates.","Mitigation":"Cross-cultural training for healthcare workers, community engagement, and culturally sensitive health messaging.","Technologies":"Language interpretation services, culturally tailored educational materials, and telehealth for remote communities.","People":"Culturally diverse communities, Indigenous populations, and minority groups.","Owner":"Healthcare providers, government health departments, and community leaders."},{"Description":"Gender inequality and economic impact on women","Impact":"Increased feminization of poverty, loss of women's jobs, and deepening of pre-existing inequalities, leading to long-term social and economic consequences.","Mitigation":"Gender-responsive economic recovery plans, women's leadership in decision-making, and targeted support for women in affected industries.","Technologies":"Gender-disaggregated data collection, women's empowerment programs, and policies promoting work-life balance.","People":"Women and girls in the workforce, women in poverty, and women in feminized industries.","Owner":"Government policymakers, international organizations, and private sector employers."}]}
